posts.title: Mac VSCode 更新失败
posts.text: Could not create temporary directory: 权限被拒绝 解决方案1sudo chown $USER ~/Library/Caches/com.microsoft.VSCode.ShipIt/ 重启之后，再更新

posts.title: 测试
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post12$ hexo new "My New Post"$ test More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
